Sentencas: The oxygen surface exchange of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) thin films was investigated using the electrical conductivity relaxation (ECR) method.
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films

Sentencas: Epitaxial (100)-, (110)-, and (111)-oriented LSM films were fabricated on corresponding SrTiO3 (STO) substrates using pulsed laser deposition.
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films

Sentencas: The LSM films had well-controlled surface qualities, exhibited bulk-like steady-state electrical properties, and exhibited surface dominated responses in ECR.
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films

Sentencas: The chemical surface exchange coefficients (k(chem)) were determined and varied from approximate to 1 x 10(-6) to 65 x 10(-6)
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films

Sentencas: cm/s, depending on temperature and orientation, with activation energies of between 0.8 and 1.2 eV.
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, a four fold variation is observed in the k(chem) values, with (110)/(100) being the highest/lowest, explained well by the high activation energy for (110), approximate to 1.16 eV, and the low energy for (111) and (100), approximate to 0.83 eV. (C) 2011 Elsevier BM.
Titulo: Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films
Effects of crystallographic orientation on the oxygen exchange rate of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 thin films
